name: CTFontManagerScope
desc: Constants that define the scope for font registration.

items.name: case process
items.desc: The font is available to the current process for the duration of the process unless directly unregistered.

items.name: case persistent
items.desc: The font is available to all processes for the current user session and will be available in subsequent sessions unless unregistered.

items.name: case session
items.desc: The font is available to the current user session but won't be available in subsequent sessions.

items.name: static var user: CTFontManagerScope
items.desc: The font is available to all processes for the current user session and will be available in subsequent sessions unless unregistered.
